text_block_list.text: Thank you very much, Bakushin O.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
I have to say, your diligence far 
exceeds my expectations.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
Oh, diligence? 
What about me makes you say that?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
You knew it is my birthday, and you 
also handle the many problems of 
the students. You're very attentive.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
I had you marked as clumsy in my 
database, based on observations. 
But it looks like it needs a revision.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
Hah, hah, ha! As the class president, 
it's only natural that I pay attention 
to everything that happens in class!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
But, I came to congratulate you 
not as class president, but as 
a dear friend!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
*blush* ... Thank you for confirming 
our friendship.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
By the way, I got you new horseshoes 
as a present. But I don't know your 
shoe size so they might not fit...!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
